title: A Study for Language Models as Agents for Strategic Decision-making Environments
details: J Oh, SY Yun - Journal of Internet Computing and Services, 2025
abstract: Abstract Language Models (LMs) have proven highly effective in reasoning, understanding, and decision-making tasks. However, Large Language Models (LLMs) like GPT-4 face challenges when deployed in real-time complex …

title: Benchmarking large language models for biomedical natural language processing applications and recommendations
details: Q Chen, Y Hu, X Peng, Q Xie, Q Jin, A Gilson… - Nature Communications, 2025
abstract: The rapid growth of biomedical literature poses challenges for manual knowledge curation and synthesis. Biomedical Natural Language Processing (BioNLP) automates the process. While Large Language Models (LLMs) have shown promise …
